UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Indolicidin analogs with broad-spectrum antimicrobial activity and low hemolytic activity
Literature.Author: Smirnova MP, Kolodkin NI, Kolobov AA, Afonin VG, Afonina IV, Stefanenko LI, Shpen VM, Shamova OV

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ML-35p(MIC50=20.8±6.45µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC50=45.8±10.21µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC50=11.3±3.06µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC50=141.7±20.41µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis L2(MIC50=166.7±25.82µg/ml)
